name: Real Road Bike Rider - Mad skills at Highway Track
name_original: Real Road Bike Rider - Mad skills at Highway Track
description:
Got a new bike? Well then let’s take it out to show off on the roads. Wait! Did you get your driver’s license? Well son you’ll have to take the bike driver’s test first if you want to ride your moto bike to the roads.

Play in simulation of an actual moto bike driver’s test to see if you have got the real sense of a biker or not. Complete 4 levels of different tests to earn your drivers’ license. Don’t overspeed and maneuver the tricky obstacles and hurdles. Pass each test and then you are free to roam the roads.

FEATURES
- 4 levels of moto bike driving tests
- Increased difficulty with each test
- Detailed bike driving controls


PASS THE LEVELS THE BEST YOU CAN
Avoid hitting a number of hurdles and check posts along the roads. Adhere to the traffic signal rules and traffic, including rash drivers coming your way.


COMPLETE ALL CHALLENGES

Complete each test with limited fuel and energy. Hitting each obstacles or failing rules will drain the fuel and energy faster. Try to ace each test if you can!
